name: Cupang Academy
description:
Made for IGSI Game Jam 2021

Theme: Unconventional Weapon

Ikan Cupang (known as Betta Fish) is a large genus of small, often colorful, freshwater ray-finned fishes, in the gourami family. The best known Betta species is B. splendens, commonly known as the Siamese fighting fish. 

Cupang Battle becomes a highly demanded hobby in the year 3077. In Cupang Academy, you'll play as Ihe, a highly motivated girl to become the best cupang trainer in the galaxy. 

Customize and weaponize your cupang to beat every trainer in the league to be the Cupang Master.

Controls

Click on the screen to clap and direct your fish, or use it to scare away your enemies.

They might listen to you, or not. They're fishes.

Credits
